title: Advice Support Executive
description:
Advice Lab is an Australian‑owned, fast‑growing back‑office solutions provider to the financial planning industry across Australia. Teamwork is the heart of everything we do, and we believe that when we work together, we deliver our purpose more powerfully.

At Advice Lab, we are driven by people. We take pride in nurturing, supporting, and shaping the career growth of every individual who becomes part of our team. When you join us, you're not just starting a job, you're stepping into a workplace that believes in your potential, celebrates your strengths, and grows with you.

Curious to learn more about who we are? Check out our Instagram and LinkedIn to get a peek into our culture and community.
keyResponsibilities: Conduct product research within the financial planning landscape
Manage client review meetings and prepare related documentation
Liaise with Advisers and complete allocated system tasks
Conduct frequent weekly audits on implementation processes
mustHaves: Minimum 1 year of experience in the BPO industry/ Banking operations would be a definite advantage
A degree or professional qualification in Finance (CIMA and ACCA students seeking practical training agreements are encouraged to apply)
skillsWeValue: Fast learner: Adapt quickly in a rapidly growing business
Self‑starter: Take initiative and go the extra mile
Comfortable with numbers: You'll be working with them daily
High attention to detail: Accuracy matters
Team player: We win together, not individually
Creative thinker: Bring your ideas, we want to hear them
Resilient mindset: Challenges don't stop us
benefits: The opportunity to join a fast‑growing organisation with global clients
A chance to take on meaningful work and accelerate your career
A workplace culture shaped by employee‑driven initiatives, genuine, inclusive, and energetic

title: Senior Paraplanner
description: Join our dynamic paraplanning team as a Senior Paraplanner. We're looking for experienced professionals who can take on leadership responsibilities and mentor junior staff members.
keyResponsibilities: Lead paraplanning operations and manage team workflows
Prepare comprehensive financial plans and documentation
Review and quality assure junior staff work
Stay updated with compliance and regulatory requirements

title: Mortgage Processor
description: We're seeking a detail-oriented Mortgage Processor to join our growing team. Handle mortgage documentation and ensure smooth processing for our clients.
keyResponsibilities: Process mortgage applications accurately and efficiently
mustHaves: Knowledge of mortgage procedures and regulations

title: Quality Assurance Specialist
description: Join our Quality Assurance team and ensure excellence in all our deliverables. We need a QA specialist who is meticulous and committed to continuous improvement.
mustHaves: Knowledge of quality standards and procedures

title: Financial Analyst
description: We're looking for a talented Financial Analyst to join our accounting team. Analyze financial data and provide insights to support business decisions.
mustHaves: Bachelor's degree in Finance or Accounting
Proficiency in Excel and financial analysis tools
